name: Inner Demons (SNG)
description:
You're in a dream!

Your dream! And it's infested with your own INNER DEMONS! Fight them off and get to the end of the level to collect your - wait for it...

  Moment Of Joy!

       

Controls:
Up - W

Left - A

Down -  S

Right - D

Interact - E

"Fire" - Left-click

Game still in alpha, would love to hear any and all feedback!
